Package infodynamics.networkinference.interregional

Class InterregionalTransferEntropy

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalChannelMeasure
      • infodynamics.networkinference.interregional.InterregionalTransferEntropy
  • public class InterregionalTransferEntropy
extends InterregionalChannelMeasure

    Compute a significance score for the inter-regional transfer entropy between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.

    Author:
    Joseph Lizier, joseph.lizier at gmail.com
